Notes: Pierce Definition: How many bloons can be popped with a single attack
Damage Definition: How many layers of a bloon are popped with a single attack
All of the data refers to pierce and damage of a single projectile (when applicable). Range and attack speed are not considered in this spreadsheet. Assumes 0 Monkey Knowledge investment.

Explanation of the (+some number): These upgrades increase pierce or damage in addition to other upgrades. For example, a 0-4-x super monkey does 6 pierce, and a 2-x-x super monkey does "4 (+3)" pierce. Take the (+3) and add it to the other upgrade to see that a 2-4-0 super monkey does 6+3=9 pierce.
Gives +4 damage against bloons and MOAB class
0-2-3 and 0-2-4 can glue 6 MOAB class, others can only glue 1 MOAB class
Damage split among what it hits
x/x/x/x refers to temple sacrifices. Also, I decided not to measure True Sun God data
Unstable concoction does 10% of health against other MOAB class bloons
200 bloons, 10 MOABs, 4 BFBs, 4 DDTs, or 2 ZOMGs
300 bloons, 15 MOABs, 6 BFBs, 6 DDTs, or 3 ZOMGs
Can only affect 1 ZOMG at a time (+ equivalent in other bloons)
Pierce is how many spikes in one pile
